alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pittsburg; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 3:25PM CDT until November 04 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stanley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Clayton... Hartshorne... Higgins... Damon... Bengal... Tuskahoma... Yanush... Robbers Cave State Park... Stanley... Dunbar... Haileyville... Gowen... Sardis... Panola... Dow... Bache... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
